item.title: Mac更新Ruby报错
item.description: Mac更新Ruby报错 sudo gem update --system ERROR: While executing gem ... (Errno::EPERM) Operation not permitted - /usr/bin/update_rubygems 解决方法： sudo gem update -n /usr/local/bin --system
